derivation: from a compound of G3588 (τηλικαύτη) with G2245 (τηλικαύτη) and G3778 (τηλικαύτη);
strongs_def: such as this, i.e. (in (figurative) magnitude) so vast
outline:
1. of age
    1. of such an age
    2. of so great an age, so old
    3. so young
  2. of so great a size, in bulk
  3. such and so great
